name: Stereotypical High School Love Story
description:
Stereotypical High School Love Story is exactly what it sounds like: dating game based on high school.

The game has six  different love interests you can chat with and get to know. At the end of the day you get to choose your main interest.

This game was made as a school project years back and has been on hold ever since. The game has only one playable day, but originally it was supposed to have seven days.
